articles.title: Omicron May Be "More Transmissible", Get Vaccinated: Top US Scientist - NDTV
articles.description: COVID-19's Omicron variant appears to be more transmissible, reinforcing the need for Americans to get vaccinations or booster shots, US health officials said.
articles.content:
Anthony Fauci said there is strong evidence of Omicron being more transmissible. (File)

articles.author: Kieran Lynch
articles.title: Harry Kane makes classy gesture to Tottenham fans travelling from US after Burnley game postponed - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Premier League clash at Turf Moor was called off a little under an hour before kick-off due to heavy snow. An American pair detailed their 31 hour trip from Dallas to watch Tottenham play Burnley.
articles.content:
Harry Kane has invited two United States-based Tottenham fans to be his guest at a future game, after they travelled 31 hours to watch the club only for their match with Burnley to be postponed.
The… [+2550 chars]

articles.title: China blowback looms for Schumer’s Innovation and Competition Act - Politico
articles.description: Beijing warns that U.S. tech and competitiveness legislation will “gravely damage America's own interests.”
articles.content: Beijing has promised retaliation if the bill makes it through Congress but has not given specifics. China experts say those reprisals may include deliberate disruptions in imported parts supplies for… [+7660 chars]

articles.title: RIP Stephen Sondheim - Dark Horizons

articles.content:
